com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer

Class HardMacro

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.AbstractModuleInst<Module,Site,ModuleInst>
      • com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.ModuleInst
        • com.xilinx.rapidwright.placer.blockplacer.HardMacro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Object>

    public class HardMacro
extends ModuleInst
implements Comparable<Object>
    This extends ModuleInst and is used by BlockPlacer and BlockPlacer2 to help calculate system cost.
